titles.title: Taxpayer Exposure Mitigation Act of 2017
Taxpayer Exposure Mitigation Act of 2017
Taxpayer Exposure Mitigation Act of 2017
Taxpayer Exposure Mitigation Act of 2017

To repeal the mandatory flood insurance coverage requirement for commercial properties located in flood hazard areas and to provide for greater transfer of risk under the National Flood Insurance Program to private capital and reinsurance markets, and for other purposes.
Taxpayer Exposure Mitigation Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 36 - 24.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Financial Services. H. Rept. 115-255.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 185.
